title: Latest Galaxy Watch 4 update is breaking some watch faces
content:
This week Samsung released a new software update for the Galaxy Watch 4 and Galaxy Watch 4 Classic. The latest update brings several new health and wellness features, including a sleep coaching program, a new interval target feature, and new body composition insights. But it appears the latest update isn’t playing nicely with some older

The post Latest Galaxy Watch 4 update is breaking some watch faces appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Following the latest update, some watch faces aren't working correctly on the Galaxy Watch 4. Read on to know more.
